DOC.brief_summary: - Describe blood pressure changes on patients with OSA treated with lateral pharyngoplasty - Compare the mean of systolic and diastolic blood pressure in 24 hours, average systolic and diastolic pressure during daytime and night and changes in the nocturnal decrease.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Lateral Pharyngoplasty on Blood Pressure in Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The variables are: Ambulatory blood pressure data Snoring scale BMI neck circumference abdominal circumference medications and life style changes
DOC.criteria: Adult Patient BMI < 35 no Benzodiazepinec User BMI > 35 Use of benzodiazepinecs Clinical contraindications to surgery (ASA III or ASA IV)
